data.title: Consumer and Patient Health Information
data.meta_description: The University of Florida Health Science Center (HSC) Libraries are active partners in the education, research, training and clinical needs of the HSC colleges, centers and institutes, the University of Florida and the state.
data.text:
General Health Medline Plus(English/Spanish)medlineplus.gov/Authoritative and up to date health information from the National Library of Medicine. Mayo Clinicmayoclinic.orgHealth information and symptom checker from the Mayo Clinic. Family Doctorfamilydoctor.org/

Patient information from the American Academy of Family Physicians Genetics Home Referenceghr.nlm.nih.gov/

Genetics Home Reference provides consumer-friendly information about the effects of genetic variation on human health. Alternative and Integrative Medicine National Center for Complementary and Integrative Healthnccih.nih.gov/

Complementary, alternative and integrative health resources for consumers and providers. Pediatrics Kids Healthkidshealth.org/

Doctor-approved health information for children from birth through adolescence. Women’s Health American College of Obstetricians and Gynecologistswww.acog.org/

Patient information for women’s health care. Men’s Health Urology Care Foundationurologyhealth.org/

Resources on urologic health for patients. Geriatrics HealthInAginghealthinaging.org/

Provides consumers and caregivers with information on health and aging. LGBTQI Gay and Lesbian Medical Associationglma.org/

Patient resources, advocacy and provider directory. Reference MediLexiconmedilexicon.com/

Medical terminology, abbreviations and dictionary of terms. Lab Tests Onlinelabtestsonline.org/Designed for patients and caregivers to help understand clinical laboratory tests and results. Medline Plus Medical Encyclopediamedlineplus.gov/encyclopedia.htmlMedical encyclopedia containing over 4000 articles on diseases, test, injuries, and treatments. Radiologyradiologyinfo.org/

Provides information on CT, MRI, ultrasound, radiation therapy and other radiological procedures. Drug Referencedrugs.com/

A comprehensive source for information on prescription and over-the-counter drugs, and herbal supplements. Health Information in Multiple Languagesnnlm.gov/consumer-health-information-many-languages-resources

A list of multilingual health resources from the National Library of Medicine. Government Centers for Disease Controlcdc.gov/

CDC provides up to date health information including disease outbreaks, travel health advisories and healthy living. Food and Drug Administrationfda.gov/Medical safety information about disease, treatment, devices and reporting. Clinical Trialsclinicaltrials.gov/

Listing of private and publicly funded clinical research studies. National Library of Medicinenlm.nih.gov/

The world’s largest biomedical library. National Institutes of Healthnih.gov/

Health resources, plus a comprehensive list of all health related institutes and centers. HIV/AIDSaidsinfo.nih.gov/Consumer health information on HIV/AIDS, including research, guidelines and treatments. Organizations

American Cancer Societycancer.org/

American Diabetes Associationdiabetes.org/ American Heart Associationheart.org/ American Lung Associationlung.org/
